document.full_text: congresswoman gabrielle giffords' doctors said on monday that she is medically able to travel to the kennedy space center in florida to attend her astronaut husband's space shuttle launch on friday.
document.title: doctors say giffords can attend husband's shuttle launch
lines_and_colors: congresswoman gabrielle giffords' doctors said on monday that she is medically able to travel to the kennedy space center in florida to attend her astronaut husband's space shuttle launch on friday.
